title: Uvalde Suspends Its Entire School Police Force
description: The move follows a protest from families over the police response to a May 24 mass shooting that killed 19 students and two teachers.
dc:creator: J. David Goodman
media:credit: Tamir Kalifa for The New York Times
media:description: Relatives of victims of the mass shooting at Robb Elementary School in Uvalde, Texas, including Gloria Cazares, center, were overcome with emotion after learning of the suspension of school district police officers on Friday.
